get.description:
List organizations or get a specific organization.
- If organization_id is provided, returns just that organization
- If user_id is provided, returns organizations for that user
- Otherwise returns all organizations (admin only)
- user_id and organization_id are mutually exclusive

parameters.name: organization_id

schema.description: Get a specific organization by ID
schema.title: Organization Id

parameters.description: Get a specific organization by ID

put.description: Update an organization (account admin or organization admin)

delete.description: Delete an organization (account admin or organization admin)

get.description:
List users or get a specific user.
- If user_id is provided, returns just that user (requires proper permissions)
- If organization_id is provided, returns users from that organization
- Otherwise returns all users (admin only)
- user_id and organization_id are mutually exclusive

parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: Get a specific user by ID
schema.title: User Id

parameters.description: Get a specific user by ID

put.description: Update a user's details (admin or self)

post.description: Send verification email for newly registered users (no auth required)
Accept an invitation and create user account if needed
